original_text: When God raised up his servant, he sent him first to you to bless you by turning each of you from your wicked ways.”
korean_text: 하나님이 그 종을 세워 복 주시려고 너희에게 먼저 보내사 너희로 하여금 돌이켜 각각 그 악함을 버리게 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: When God raised up his servant
he sent him first to you
by turning each of you from your wicked ways
